topic.title: Need some help, Please. Someone enter in my computer and cost my Marriage. How can i get is IP Adress?
topic.body: If somebody could help me i will apreciate a lot. But im so confused and depressed at the moment that im to tired to figure it out myself. I know the person and i have is email and hes my friend in facebook. Can someone give me some help??? Please... Thanks and sorry about bothering you ppl. :(

1_1DHp9XeGd9EU3nm7h3Uf7BvxxiQsRUjmdJ.body: > [ks](#comment_11_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): If you really expect somebody to help you, you need to give us much more details: Which operating system are you talking about? Windows, Linux, Mac, …? How did said person “enter your computer”? What kind of help do you expect from people here?

Ks thanks for your help. Ive send u a zeromail.  
:)
